00009 #if !defined(Apoxi_TimeZone_hpp)
00010 #define Apoxi_TimeZone_hpp
00013 
00014 #include <Auxiliary/WString.hpp>
00015 
00016 class TimeZone {
00017     public:
00018         enum {
00019             InvalidOffset = 0xffff
00020         };
00021 
00022         enum DstIndication {
00023             StandardTime = 0,
00024             Plus1Hour = 1,
00025             Plus2Hours = 2,
00026             InvalidDst = 3
00027         };//DstIndication
00028 
00030         TimeZone();
00032         TimeZone(INT offset, DstIndication dst_ind) :
00033             m_offset(((offset >= -48) && (offset <= 51)) ? offset : InvalidOffset),
00034             m_dst_ind((dst_ind <= 2) ? dst_ind:InvalidDst) {}
00035 
00037         TimeZone(const TimeZone &tz);
00039         ~TimeZone() {}
00040 
00042         BOOLEAN IsOffsetInvalid() const { return m_offset == InvalidOffset; }
00044         BOOLEAN IsDstIndInvalid() const { return m_dst_ind == InvalidDst; }
00046         void SetOffset(INT offset) { m_offset = ((offset >= -48) && (offset <= 51)) ? offset : InvalidOffset; }
00048         INT  GetOffset() const { return m_offset; }
00050         void SetDstInd(DstIndication dst_ind) { m_dst_ind = ((dst_ind <= 2)) ? dst_ind : InvalidDst; }
00052         DstIndication GetDstInd() const { return m_dst_ind; }
00054         void SetTimeZone(const TimeZone &tz);
00055 
00061         WString Format(const WCHAR* wchr_format= L"GMT: %o DST: %d",
00062                        const WCHAR* wchr_invalid_offset= L"n/a",
00063                        const WCHAR* wchr_invalid_dst= L"n/a") const;
00065         BOOLEAN operator==(const TimeZone &tz) const { return (m_offset == tz.m_offset && m_dst_ind == tz.m_dst_ind); }
00067         BOOLEAN operator!=(const TimeZone &tz) const { return ! operator==(tz); }
00068 
00069     private:
00072          INT m_offset;
00073 
00076          DstIndication m_dst_ind;
00077 
00078 };//class TimeZone
00079 
00081 #endif
